attributes.action: gain permission to remove Jenni Need.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an upstanding member of the De Beauvoir community, i believe the world would be a better (and quieter) place if Jenni Need was an inactive part of this happy (and ultimately Asian) community.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
